definition: in a word/in short/in brief
always/to assemble/gather/total/overall/head/chief/general/in every case
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it

sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 总之，只要让我在第戎下火车就行。

sentences.english: In short" to do good work, must first sharpen his tools."
sentences.chinese: 总之“工欲善其事，必先利其器。

sentences.english: All told, this will not only directly help  families and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 总之，这项计划不仅仅会直接帮助家庭和企业。

sentences.english: In short, maternal instinct is wonderful, but it has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 总之，母性本能是美好的，但它有其局限性。

sentences.english: Either way, it’s really destructive to talk only about the dangers of sex.
sentences.chinese: 总之只跟孩子谈性的危险是极具破坏性的。

sentences.english: After all, I got a not-bad result.
sentences.chinese: 总之，我有一个不算坏的结果。

sentences.english: Anyway, I promise you I'll try to focus on study from now on.
sentences.chinese: 总之我答应你，以后会好好学习。

sentences.english: In total, the first era of One Piece stretches to 516 episodes.
sentences.chinese: 总之，《海贼王》的第一个时代一直到第516集。

sentences.english: In other words, avoid the left side of the entire hole.
sentences.chinese: 总之，你应该尽量避开洞的整个左侧区域。

sentences.english: To sum up all, uprisings have been disastrous.
sentences.chinese: 总之，暴动是件祸国殃民的事。

sentences.english: All told, there were seven major revisions.
sentences.chinese: 总之，一共有七次重大修改。

sentences.english: Anyway-ill believe it when ill see it.
sentences.chinese: 总之我不见到是不相信的。

sentences.english: Obviously he was a controversial historical figure.
sentences.chinese: 总之，冯道是个颇有争议的历史人物。

sentences.english: The right person is still gonna think the sun shines out of your ass.
sentences.chinese: 总之对路的人会觉得你放的屁都是香的。

sentences.english: Above all, we need to bring bottom-line value for the client.
sentences.chinese: 总之，我们需要将真正的价值带给我们的客户。

sentences.english: In a word, during using the diathermanous inductor, it must be observed as well as checked.
sentences.chinese: 总之，透热感应器在使用过程中还必须边观察边检查。

definition: in short/in a word/in brief
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
or/still/nevertheless/had better
as for/as to/to go so far as to
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
in any case/no matter what
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
actually/in fact/really
not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
